person.note: Cheng(1) Bi [10755] He refers to Cheng(1) Dachang [3109] as a clansman (zongren) (see CBD, 4, 3001) and is, therefore, a member of another branch of the kinship group descended from Cheng(1) Lingxi [15355]. CHECK funerary inscription in Bi's collected papers. CBD, 4, 3003-3004.
